name: 部署基础服务组件
description: 基础服务组件包括 Redis、Minio、RabbitMQ 等等

steps.name: 解压部署包
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(ls /app/base/ | grep base.tar.gz)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi'

steps.name: 下载Redis镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep redis)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 传输Redis镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep redis)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 下载Minio镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep minio)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 传输Minio镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep minio)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 加载Redis和Minio镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(ls /app/images/ | grep tar)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi'
steps.command: for image in $(ls /app/images/*.tar); do docker load -i "${image}"; done
